Comments
May 17, 2021
Goop
I love me some charge, bcf, flurry action. You also have prec strike and battle fury that gets through shape change and super senses. A very aggressive piece but 17 toughness is pretty squishy for an up close only attacker. Anyway plan on perplexing up her defense and she can bring a lot of pain. An awesome piece to keep on your sideline to swap in against a team of SC/SS figs.
